title: 10 things in tech you need to know today
text:
Some board members at coworking startup WeWork are aiming to push out CEO Adam Neumann, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal. Jackal Pan/Getty Images; Jacqueline Larma/AP Images; Samantha Lee/Business Insider

Good morning! This is the tech news you need to know this Monday.

Have an Amazon Alexa device? Now you can hear 10 Things in Tech each morning. Just search for "Business Insider" in your Alexa's flash briefing settings.

You can also subscribe to this newsletter here — just tick "10 Things in Tech You Need to Know."
description: WeWork's charismatic and controversial CEO Adam Neumann is reportedly in the hotseat after the company shelved its IPO until later this year.
